pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface to the Poloniex Cryptocurrency Trading API // Provides a user-friendly R wrapper on top of the Poloniex (Cryptocurrency Trading) REST API (see https://poloniex.com/support/api/ for more information). Results are converted into R data structures and are returned to the users in an intuitive manner. The package provides the users with two separate S4 classes: - 'PoloniexPublicAPI': Consists of wrapper methods on top of the Poloniex Public REST API. - 'PoloniexTradingAPI': Consists of wrapper methods on top of the Poloniex Trading REST API.
